title: IEEE AESS Technical Challenge Lead, TSYP12
description: Led the IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Society (AESS) Technical challenge team during the TSYP12 event, focused on developing an oil spill detection system using Satellite imaging.

title: Media Team Member, IEEE Go Data Science 3.0 Hackathon
description: Contributed to the organization’s team in for the IEEE Go Data Science 3.0 hackathon part of the media organization team, handling social media posts

title: 2nd Place, TourismTechJam
description: Designed a modern mobile app integrating multiple Destination Management Organizations (DMOs) to address user travel needs, earning 2nd place.

title: 1st place Winner, HackurWaste Hackathon
description: Built a mobile app integrated with a reverse vending machine for recycling plastic bottles, rewarding users with redeemable points for coupons.

title: 3rd Place, EPC3.0 Competitive Programming
description: Achieved 3rd place in EPC3.0, a competitive programming contest for ENSI students, solving algorithmic challenges under time constraints.

title: 1st place winners, SYP6.0 Pitching Competition
description: Brainstormed and pitched an innovative idea within a 5‑hour timeframe during the SYP6.0.
